name: AnimalSoundQuiz
0:
”Alexa open animal sound quiz”
”Alexa start animal sound quiz”
”Alexa ask animal sound quiz to start a new game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal sound quiz
des: This is the Echo Buttons multiplayer version of popular 'Guess The Animal' skill. A fun game to teach animal sounds to kids during the early development stage. Helps with memory and kills boredom. If you have a couple of pre-schoolers or on a play date, just start the skill, listen to the animal or bird sound and hit the buzzer, then reply with the animal name.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
